info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 26 at 3:45PM EDT until May 28 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Northwest wind 10 to 20 mph with waves 4 to 7 feet. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte county. In Michigan, Berrien county. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
